page.title: 03HOUSING IN BROMLEY CROSS
page.content: Dunscar Fold Farm is the oldest building in the area and was built in the 1600's during the reign of James I.It was built from local sandstone from the local Cox Green quarries, along with other cottages in the area.Tongfields has some weavers cottages built in 1797.Local weavers worked on their looms in the cellars. In the 1800's houses were built along Darwen Rd,at that time,the main Bolton to Blackburn road.Mainly,the terraced cottages were made from sandstone and with slated roofs.There was very little housing development until the 1960's and many different housing estates have been built of bungalows made from brick or wooden structures. The last of the housing was completed in 1984.
